ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi adalla a'malahum
ayah_english: Those who disbelieve and turn away from (the) way of Allah (the) way of Allah He will cause to be lost their deeds

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi adalla a'malahum
ayah_english: Those who disbelieve and turn away from (the) way of Allah (the) way of Allah He will cause to be lost their deeds

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَءَامَنُواْ بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمۡ كَفَّرَ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَأَصۡلَحَ بَالَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati waamanu bima nuzzila ala muhammadin wahuwa al-haqu min rabbihim kaffara anhum sayyiatihim wa-aslaha balahum
ayah_english: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what is revealed to Muhammad and it (is) the truth from their Lord He will remove from them their misdeeds and improve their condition

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَءَامَنُواْ بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمۡ كَفَّرَ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَأَصۡلَحَ بَالَهُمۡ

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ مِن رَّبِّهِمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَضۡرِبُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-anna alladhina kafaru ittaba'u al-batila wa-anna alladhina amanu ittaba'u al-haqa min rabbihim kadhalika yadribu al-lahu lilnnasi amthalahum
ayah_english: That (is) because those who disbelieve follow falsehood and because those who believe follow (the) truth from their Lord Thus Allah presents Allah presents to the people their similitudes

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ مِن رَّبِّهِمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَضۡرِبُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-anna alladhina kafaru ittaba'u al-batila wa-anna alladhina amanu ittaba'u al-haqa min rabbihim kadhalika yadribu al-lahu lilnnasi amthalahum
ayah_english: That (is) because those who disbelieve follow falsehood and because those who believe follow (the) truth from their Lord Thus Allah presents Allah presents to the people their similitudes

ayah_english: That (is) because those who disbelieve follow falsehood and because those who believe follow (the) truth from their Lord Thus Allah presents Allah presents to the people their similitudes

ayah: فَإِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَضَرۡبَ ٱلرِّقَابِ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَثۡخَنتُمُوهُمۡ فَشُدُّواْ ٱلۡوَثَاقَ فَإِمَّا مَنَّۢا بَعۡدُ وَإِمَّا فِدَآءً حَتَّىٰ تَضَعَ ٱلۡحَرۡبُ أَوۡزَارَهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَلَوۡ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ لَٱنتَصَرَ مِنۡهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لِّيَبۡلُوَاْ بَعۡضَكُم بِبَعۡضٖۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَن يُضِلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: fa-idha laqitumu alladhina kafaru fadarba al-riqabi hatta idha athkhantumuhum fashuddu al-wathaqa fa-imma mannan ba'du wa-imma fidaan hatta tada'a al-harbu awzaraha dhalika walaw yashau al-lahu la-intasara min'hum walakin liyabluwa ba'dakum biba'din wa-alladhina qutilu fi sabili al-lahi falan yudilla a'malahum
ayah_english: So when you meet those who disbelieve then strike the necks until when you have subdued them then bind firmly the bond then either a favor afterwards or ransom until lays down the war its burdens That And if Allah had willed Allah had willed surely, He could have taken retribution from them but to test some of you with others And those who are killed in (the) way of Allah (the) way of Allah then never He will cause to be lost their deeds

ayah_english: So when you meet those who disbelieve then strike the necks until when you have subdued them then bind firmly the bond then either a favor afterwards or ransom until lays down the war its burdens That And if Allah had willed Allah had willed surely, He could have taken retribution from them but to test some of you with others And those who are killed in (the) way of Allah (the) way of Allah then never He will cause to be lost their deeds

ayah: وَيُدۡخِلُهُمُ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ عَرَّفَهَا لَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: wayud'khiluhumu al-janata arrafaha lahum
ayah_english: And admit them (to) Paradise He has made it known to them

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu in tansuru al-laha yansur'kum wayuthabbit aqdamakum
ayah_english: O you who believe O you who believe O you who believe If you help Allah He will help you and make firm your feet

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَتَعۡسٗا لَّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina kafaru fata'san lahum wa-adalla a'malahum
ayah_english: But those who disbelieve destruction is for them and He will cause to be lost their deeds

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَرِهُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-annahum karihu ma anzala al-lahu fa-ahbata a'malahum
ayah_english: That (is) because they hate what Allah has revealed Allah has revealed so He has made worthless their deeds

ayah: ۞أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ دَمَّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ وَلِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡثَٰلُهَا
ayah_translit: afalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim dammara al-lahu alayhim walil'kafirina amthaluha
ayah_english: Do not they travel in the earth and see how was (the) end (of) those before them before them Allah destroyed Allah destroyed [over] them and for the disbelievers its likeness

ayah: ۞أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ دَمَّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ وَلِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡثَٰلُهَا

ayah: ۞أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ دَمَّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ وَلِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡثَٰلُهَا
ayah_translit: afalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim dammara al-lahu alayhim walil'kafirina amthaluha
ayah_english: Do not they travel in the earth and see how was (the) end (of) those before them before them Allah destroyed Allah destroyed [over] them and for the disbelievers its likeness

ayah: ۞أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ دَمَّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ وَلِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡثَٰلُهَا
ayah_translit: afalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim dammara al-lahu alayhim walil'kafirina amthaluha
ayah_english: Do not they travel in the earth and see how was (the) end (of) those before them before them Allah destroyed Allah destroyed [over] them and for the disbelievers its likeness

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-anna al-laha mawla alladhina amanu wa-anna al-kafirina la mawla lahum
ayah_english: That (is) because Allah (is the) Protector (of) those who believe and because the disbelievers (there is) no protector for them

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

ayah_translit: dhalika bi-anna al-laha mawla alladhina amanu wa-anna al-kafirina la mawla lahum

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-anna al-laha mawla alladhina amanu wa-anna al-kafirina la mawla lahum
ayah_english: That (is) because Allah (is the) Protector (of) those who believe and because the disbelievers (there is) no protector for them

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدۡخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأۡكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأۡكُلُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ وَٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوٗى لَّهُمۡ
ayah_translit: inna al-laha yud'khilu alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu wa-alladhina kafaru yatamatta'una wayakuluna kama takulu al-an'amu wal-naru mathwan lahum
ayah_english: Indeed Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds (to) gardens flow from underneath it the rivers but those who disbelieve they enjoy and eat as eat the cattle and the Fire (will be) an abode for them

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدۡخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأۡكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأۡكُلُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ وَٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوٗى لَّهُمۡ

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدۡخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأۡكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأۡكُلُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ وَٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوٗى لَّهُمۡ

ayah_english: Indeed Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds (to) gardens flow from underneath it the rivers but those who disbelieve they enjoy and eat as eat the cattle and the Fire (will be) an abode for them

ayah: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ هِيَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةٗ مِّن قَرۡيَتِكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَخۡرَجَتۡكَ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡ فَلَا نَاصِرَ لَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: waka-ayyin min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatan min qaryatika allati akhrajatka ahlaknahum fala nasira lahum
ayah_english: And how many of a town which (was) stronger (in) strength than your town which has driven you out We destroyed them so no helper for them

ayah: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ هِيَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةٗ مِّن قَرۡيَتِكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَخۡرَجَتۡكَ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡ فَلَا نَاصِرَ لَهُمۡ

ayah_translit: waka-ayyin min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatan min qaryatika allati akhrajatka ahlaknahum fala nasira lahum
ayah_english: And how many of a town which (was) stronger (in) strength than your town which has driven you out We destroyed them so no helper for them

ayah: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُۥ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُم
ayah_translit: afaman kana ala bayyinatin min rabbihi kaman zuyyina lahu suu amalihi wa-ittaba'u ahwaahum
ayah_english: Then is (he) who is on a clear proof from his Lord like (he) who is made attractive for him (the) evil (of) his deeds while they follow their desires

ayah: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُۥ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُم

ayah: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُۥ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُم
ayah_translit: afaman kana ala bayyinatin min rabbihi kaman zuyyina lahu suu amalihi wa-ittaba'u ahwaahum
ayah_english: Then is (he) who is on a clear proof from his Lord like (he) who is made attractive for him (the) evil (of) his deeds while they follow their desires

ayah: مَّثَلُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۖ فِيهَآ أَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّن مَّآءٍ غَيۡرِ ءَاسِنٖ وَأَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّن لَّبَنٖ لَّمۡ يَتَغَيَّرۡ طَعۡمُهُۥ وَأَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّنۡ خَمۡرٖ لَّذَّةٖ لِّلشَّـٰرِبِينَ وَأَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّنۡ عَسَلٖ مُّصَفّٗىۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ كَمَنۡ هُوَ خَٰلِدٞ فِي ٱلنَّارِ وَسُقُواْ مَآءً حَمِيمٗا فَقَطَّعَ أَمۡعَآءَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: mathalu al-janati allati wu'ida al-mutaquna fiha anharun min main ghayri asinin wa-anharun min labanin lam yataghayyar ta'muhu wa-anharun min khamrin ladhatin lilsharibina wa-anharun min asalin musaffan walahum fiha min kulli al-thamarati wamaghfiratun min rabbihim kaman huwa khalidun fi al-nari wasuqu maan hamiman faqatta'a am'aahum
ayah_english: A parable (of) Paradise which is promised (to) the righteous Therein (are) rivers of water not polluted and rivers of milk not changes its taste and rivers of wine delicious to (the) drinkers and rivers of honey purified and for them therein of all fruits and forgiveness from their Lord like he who like he who (will) abide forever in the Fire and they will be given to drink water boiling so it cuts into pieces their intestines

ayah: مَّثَلُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۖ فِيهَآ أَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّن مَّآءٍ غَيۡرِ ءَاسِنٖ وَأَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّن لَّبَنٖ لَّمۡ يَتَغَيَّرۡ طَعۡمُهُۥ وَأَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّنۡ خَمۡرٖ لَّذَّةٖ لِّلشَّـٰرِبِينَ وَأَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّنۡ عَسَلٖ مُّصَفّٗىۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ كَمَنۡ هُوَ خَٰلِدٞ فِي ٱلنَّارِ وَسُقُواْ مَآءً حَمِيمٗا فَقَطَّعَ أَمۡعَآءَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: mathalu al-janati allati wu'ida al-mutaquna fiha anharun min main ghayri asinin wa-anharun min labanin lam yataghayyar ta'muhu wa-anharun min khamrin ladhatin lilsharibina wa-anharun min asalin musaffan walahum fiha min kulli al-thamarati wamaghfiratun min rabbihim kaman huwa khalidun fi al-nari wasuqu maan hamiman faqatta'a am'aahum

ayah_english: A parable (of) Paradise which is promised (to) the righteous Therein (are) rivers of water not polluted and rivers of milk not changes its taste and rivers of wine delicious to (the) drinkers and rivers of honey purified and for them therein of all fruits and forgiveness from their Lord like he who like he who (will) abide forever in the Fire and they will be given to drink water boiling so it cuts into pieces their intestines

ayah: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُ إِلَيۡكَ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا خَرَجُواْ مِنۡ عِندِكَ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مَاذَا قَالَ ءَانِفًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: wamin'hum man yastami'u ilayka hatta idha kharaju min indika qalu lilladhina utu al-'il'ma madha qala anifan ulaika alladhina taba'a al-lahu ala qulubihim wa-ittaba'u ahwaahum
ayah_english: And among them (are some) who listen to you until when they depart from you they say to those who were given the knowledge What (has) he said just now Those (are) the ones Allah has set a seal Allah has set a seal upon their hearts and they follow their desires

ayah: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُ إِلَيۡكَ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا خَرَجُواْ مِنۡ عِندِكَ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مَاذَا قَالَ ءَانِفًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ

ayah: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُ إِلَيۡكَ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا خَرَجُواْ مِنۡ عِندِكَ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مَاذَا قَالَ ءَانِفًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina ih'tadaw zadahum hudan waatahum taqwahum
ayah_english: And those who accept guidance He increases them (in) guidance and gives them their righteousness

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

ayah_translit: wa-alladhina ih'tadaw zadahum hudan waatahum taqwahum

ayah: فَهَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُم بَغۡتَةٗۖ فَقَدۡ جَآءَ أَشۡرَاطُهَاۚ فَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمۡ إِذَا جَآءَتۡهُمۡ ذِكۡرَىٰهُمۡ
ayah_translit: fahal yanzuruna illa al-sa'ata an tatiyahum baghtatan faqad jaa ashratuha fa-anna lahum idha jaathum dhik'rahum
ayah_english: Then do they wait but (for) the Hour that it should come to them suddenly But indeed have come its indications Then how to them when has come to them their reminder

ayah_translit: fahal yanzuruna illa al-sa'ata an tatiyahum baghtatan faqad jaa ashratuha fa-anna lahum idha jaathum dhik'rahum

ayah: فَٱعۡلَمۡ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمۡ وَمَثۡوَىٰكُمۡ
ayah_translit: fa-i'lam annahu la ilaha illa al-lahu wa-is'taghfir lidhanbika walil'mu'minina wal-mu'minati wal-lahu ya'lamu mutaqallabakum wamathwakum
ayah_english: So know that [He] (there is) no god but Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and the believing women And Allah knows your movement and your resting places

ayah_english: So know that [He] (there is) no god but Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and the believing women And Allah knows your movement and your resting places

ayah: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَتۡ سُورَةٞۖ فَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةٞ مُّحۡكَمَةٞ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا ٱلۡقِتَالُ رَأَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ نَظَرَ ٱلۡمَغۡشِيِّ عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ فَأَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: wayaqulu alladhina amanu lawla nuzzilat suratun fa-idha unzilat suratun muh'kamatun wadhukira fiha al-qitalu ra-ayta alladhina fi qulubihim maradun yanzuruna ilayka nazara al-maghshiyi alayhi mina al-mawti fa-awla lahum
ayah_english: And say those who believe Why not has been revealed a Surah But when is revealed a Surah precise and is mentioned in it the fighting you see those who in their hearts (is) a disease looking at you a look (of) one fainting (of) one fainting from the death But more appropriate for them

ayah_english: And say those who believe Why not has been revealed a Surah But when is revealed a Surah precise and is mentioned in it the fighting you see those who in their hearts (is) a disease looking at you a look (of) one fainting (of) one fainting from the death But more appropriate for them

ayah: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَتۡ سُورَةٞۖ فَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةٞ مُّحۡكَمَةٞ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا ٱلۡقِتَالُ رَأَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ نَظَرَ ٱلۡمَغۡشِيِّ عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ فَأَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

ayah: طَاعَةٞ وَقَوۡلٞ مَّعۡرُوفٞۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ فَلَوۡ صَدَقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡ
ayah_translit: ta'atun waqawlun ma'rufun fa-idha azama al-amru falaw sadaqu al-laha lakana khayran lahum
ayah_english: (Is) obedience and a word kind And when (is) determined the matter then if they had been true (to) Allah surely it would have been better for them

ayah: طَاعَةٞ وَقَوۡلٞ مَّعۡرُوفٞۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ فَلَوۡ صَدَقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡ

ayah: فَهَلۡ عَسَيۡتُمۡ إِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ أَن تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓاْ أَرۡحَامَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: fahal asaytum in tawallaytum an tuf'sidu fi al-ardi watuqatti'u arhamakum
ayah_english: Then would you perhaps if you are given authority that you cause corruption in the earth and cut off your ties of kinship

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمۡ وَأَعۡمَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina la'anahumu al-lahu fa-asammahum wa-a'ma absarahum
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones Allah has cursed them Allah has cursed them so He made them deaf and blinded their vision

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمۡ وَأَعۡمَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina la'anahumu al-lahu fa-asammahum wa-a'ma absarahum
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones Allah has cursed them Allah has cursed them so He made them deaf and blinded their vision

ayah: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ أَمۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقۡفَالُهَآ
ayah_translit: afala yatadabbaruna al-qur'ana am ala qulubin aqfaluha
ayah_english: Then do not they ponder (over) the Quran or upon (their) hearts (are) locks

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَٰرِهِم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَى ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمۡ وَأَمۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina ir'taddu ala adbarihim min ba'di ma tabayyana lahumu al-huda al-shaytanu sawwala lahum wa-amla lahum
ayah_english: Indeed those who return on their backs after after what (has) become clear to them the guidance Shaitaan enticed [for] them and prolonged hope for them

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَٰرِهِم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَى ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمۡ وَأَمۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُواْ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي بَعۡضِ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِسۡرَارَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-annahum qalu lilladhina karihu ma nazzala al-lahu sanuti'ukum fi ba'di al-amri wal-lahu ya'lamu is'rarahum
ayah_english: That (is) because they [they] said to those who hate what Allah has revealed Allah has revealed We will obey you in part (of) the matter But Allah knows their secrets

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُواْ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي بَعۡضِ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِسۡرَارَهُمۡ

ayah: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: fakayfa idha tawaffathumu al-malaikatu yadribuna wujuhahum wa-adbarahum
ayah_english: Then how when take them in death the Angels striking their faces and their backs

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُواْ مَآ أَسۡخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-annahumu ittaba'u ma askhata al-laha wakarihu rid'wanahu fa-ahbata a'malahum
ayah_english: That (is) because they followed what angered Allah and hated His pleasure so He made worthless their deeds

ayah: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخۡرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضۡغَٰنَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: am hasiba alladhina fi qulubihim maradun an lan yukh'rija al-lahu adghanahum
ayah_english: Or do think those who in their hearts (is) a disease that never will Allah bring forth will Allah bring forth their hatred

ayah: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَأَرَيۡنَٰكَهُمۡ فَلَعَرَفۡتَهُم بِسِيمَٰهُمۡۚ وَلَتَعۡرِفَنَّهُمۡ فِي لَحۡنِ ٱلۡقَوۡلِۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: walaw nashau la-araynakahum fala'araftahum bisimahum walata'rifannahum fi lahni al-qawli wal-lahu ya'lamu a'malakum
ayah_english: And if We willed surely We could show them to you and you would know them by their marks but surely you will know them by (the) tone (of their) speech And Allah knows your deeds

ayah: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَأَرَيۡنَٰكَهُمۡ فَلَعَرَفۡتَهُم بِسِيمَٰهُمۡۚ وَلَتَعۡرِفَنَّهُمۡ فِي لَحۡنِ ٱلۡقَوۡلِۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

ayah_english: And if We willed surely We could show them to you and you would know them by their marks but surely you will know them by (the) tone (of their) speech And Allah knows your deeds

ayah: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُجَٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَنَبۡلُوَاْ أَخۡبَارَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: walanabluwannakum hatta na'lama al-mujahidina minkum wal-sabirina wanabluwa akhbarakum
ayah_english: And surely We will test you until We make evident those who strive among you and the patient ones and We will test your affairs
word_tranlation: And surely We will test you

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَشَآقُّواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَسَيُحۡبِطُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi washaqqu al-rasula min ba'di ma tabayyana lahumu al-huda lan yadurru al-laha shayan wasayuh'bitu a'malahum
ayah_english: Indeed those who disbelieve and turn away from (the) way of Allah (the) way of Allah and opposed the Messenger after after [what] (has been) made clear to them the guidance never will they harm Allah (in) anything and He will make worthless their deeds

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَشَآقُّواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَسَيُحۡبِطُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَشَآقُّواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَسَيُحۡبِطُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

ayah_english: Indeed those who disbelieve and turn away from (the) way of Allah (the) way of Allah and opposed the Messenger after after [what] (has been) made clear to them the guidance never will they harm Allah (in) anything and He will make worthless their deeds

ayah: ۞يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ati'u al-laha wa-ati'u al-rasula wala tub'tilu a'malakum
ayah_english: O (you who) (O) you who believe Obey Allah and obey the Messenger and (do) not make vain your deeds

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كُفَّارٞ فَلَن يَغۡفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi thumma matu wahum kuffarun falan yaghfira al-lahu lahum
ayah_english: Indeed those who disbelieve and turn away from (the) way (of) Allah then died while they (were) disbelievers never will Allah forgive will Allah forgive them

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كُفَّارٞ فَلَن يَغۡفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ

ayah: فَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَتَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّلۡمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: fala tahinu watad'u ila al-salmi wa-antumu al-a'lawna wal-lahu ma'akum walan yatirakum a'malakum
ayah_english: So (do) not weaken and call for peace while you (are) superior and Allah (is) with you and never will deprive you (of) your deeds

ayah: فَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَتَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّلۡمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

ayah: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞۚ وَإِن تُؤۡمِنُواْ وَتَتَّقُواْ يُؤۡتِكُمۡ أُجُورَكُمۡ وَلَا يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: innama al-hayatu al-dun'ya la'ibun walahwun wa-in tu'minu watattaqu yu'tikum ujurakum wala yasalkum amwalakum
ayah_english: Only the life (of) the world (is) play and amusement And if you believe and fear (Allah) He will give you your rewards and not will ask you (for) your wealth

ayah: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞۚ وَإِن تُؤۡمِنُواْ وَتَتَّقُواْ يُؤۡتِكُمۡ أُجُورَكُمۡ وَلَا يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلَكُمۡ

ayah: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: in yasalkumuha fayuh'fikum tabkhalu wayukh'rij adghanakum
ayah_english: If He were to ask you for it and press you you will withhold and He will bring forth your hatred

ayah: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: in yasalkumuha fayuh'fikum tabkhalu wayukh'rij adghanakum
ayah_english: If He were to ask you for it and press you you will withhold and He will bring forth your hatred

ayah: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: in yasalkumuha fayuh'fikum tabkhalu wayukh'rij adghanakum
ayah_english: If He were to ask you for it and press you you will withhold and He will bring forth your hatred

ayah: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ
ayah_translit: in yasalkumuha fayuh'fikum tabkhalu wayukh'rij adghanakum
ayah_english: If He were to ask you for it and press you you will withhold and He will bring forth your hatred

ayah: هَـٰٓأَنتُمۡ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ تُدۡعَوۡنَ لِتُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبۡخَلُۖ وَمَن يَبۡخَلۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَبۡخَلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ يَسۡتَبۡدِلۡ قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوٓاْ أَمۡثَٰلَكُم
ayah_translit: haantum haulai tud'awna litunfiqu fi sabili al-lahi faminkum man yabkhalu waman yabkhal fa-innama yabkhalu an nafsihi wal-lahu al-ghaniyu wa-antumu al-fuqarau wa-in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghayrakum thumma la yakunu amthalakum
ayah_english: Here you are these called to spend in (the) way (of) Allah but among you (are some) who withhold and whoever withholds then only he withholds from himself But Allah (is) Free of need while you (are) the needy And if you turn away He will replace you (with) a people other than you then not they will be (the) likes of you

ayah: هَـٰٓأَنتُمۡ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ تُدۡعَوۡنَ لِتُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبۡخَلُۖ وَمَن يَبۡخَلۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَبۡخَلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ يَسۡتَبۡدِلۡ قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوٓاْ أَمۡثَٰلَكُم
ayah_translit: haantum haulai tud'awna litunfiqu fi sabili al-lahi faminkum man yabkhalu waman yabkhal fa-innama yabkhalu an nafsihi wal-lahu al-ghaniyu wa-antumu al-fuqarau wa-in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghayrakum thumma la yakunu amthalakum

ayah: هَـٰٓأَنتُمۡ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ تُدۡعَوۡنَ لِتُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبۡخَلُۖ وَمَن يَبۡخَلۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَبۡخَلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ يَسۡتَبۡدِلۡ قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوٓاْ أَمۡثَٰلَكُم

ayah: هَـٰٓأَنتُمۡ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ تُدۡعَوۡنَ لِتُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبۡخَلُۖ وَمَن يَبۡخَلۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَبۡخَلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ يَسۡتَبۡدِلۡ قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوٓاْ أَمۡثَٰلَكُم
ayah_translit: haantum haulai tud'awna litunfiqu fi sabili al-lahi faminkum man yabkhalu waman yabkhal fa-innama yabkhalu an nafsihi wal-lahu al-ghaniyu wa-antumu al-fuqarau wa-in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghayrakum thumma la yakunu amthalakum
ayah_english: Here you are these called to spend in (the) way (of) Allah but among you (are some) who withhold and whoever withholds then only he withholds from himself But Allah (is) Free of need while you (are) the needy And if you turn away He will replace you (with) a people other than you then not they will be (the) likes of you
